tasks.description: Master instructions for Claude Code. Defines INITIALIZER and BUILDER modes, architectural rules, quality gate requirements, sub-agent delegation, error handling.
Design system skill. Aesthetic directions, typography pairings, color system, component patterns, accessibility requirements, schema.org templates, anti-patterns.
Discovery questionnaire schema. Business info, audience, brand, local SEO, social profiles, pages, features, content status.
Empty feature list template with structure comment. Will be populated by INITIALIZER mode.
Empty session handoff file with header comment explaining purpose.
Dev server startup script. Installs composer/npm deps if needed, starts PHP built-in server on localhost:8000.
Quality gate script. Runs PHP lint, PHPStan, PHPCS, Stylelint, ESLint, html-validate, pa11y, Lighthouse. Exits non-zero on failure.
PHP dependencies: phpstan/phpstan, squizlabs/php_codesniffer, friendsofphp/php-cs-fixer, wildbit/postmark-php (Postmark email).
Node dependencies: stylelint, eslint, html-validate, pa11y, lighthouse, browser-sync (optional).
PHPStan config. Level 9, strict mode, paths to src/.
PHPCS config. PSR-12 standard, paths to src/.
PHP-CS-Fixer config. Matches PHPCS rules for auto-fixing.
Stylelint config. Standard rules, no !important, property order.
ESLint config. ES6+, browser globals, no jQuery, Alpine.js globals allowed.
HTML validator config. WCAG rules, semantic HTML requirements.
Apache config. Security headers (X-Frame-Options, X-Content-Type-Options, etc.), clean URLs, PHP error hiding, directory listing disabled.
JSON-LD template for LocalBusiness, Organization, WebSite schema. Commented example.
Meta tags template for OG, Twitter cards, geo tags. Commented example with variables.
CSS custom properties skeleton. Colors, typography scale, breakpoints, spacing. Empty/placeholder values.
Placeholder to keep empty directory in git.

Placeholder to keep empty directory in git.
Standard ignores: vendor/, node_modules/, .env, *.log, .DS_Store, etc.
Human-readable instructions. How to clone template, run init, use Claude, etc.

open_questions.question: Placeholder content strategy - Lorem Ipsum + Unsplash with REPLACE ME comments?
open_questions.answer: AI-generate copy during build. For images: source stock, provide SDXL/Flux prompts, or placeholder as last resort.

open_questions.question: Include .htaccess for Apache deployment basics?
open_questions.answer: Yes, include with security headers and clean URLs.

open_questions.question: Contact form handler - PHP mail(), file log, or both?
open_questions.answer: Postmark for email delivery. Prompt for API key and sender domain during onboarding. Local JSON log for failed Postmark attempts.

open_questions.question: Include Puppeteer MCP for visual testing or manual browser check only?
open_questions.answer: Manual browser check for now. Puppeteer can be added later.
